name: The Summoner's Code
body:
### Index

[1. Support Your Team](http://puu.sh/k0X9E/8be1353630.png/)  Typical player who flames the entire team

[2. Drive Constructive Feedback](http://puu.sh/k0XmP/033b01d7db.png/)  Who harass because a simple error

[3. Facilitate Civil Discussion](http://puu.sh/k0XsU/8730beadf9.png/)  Free flamers

[4. Enjoy Yourself, but not at Anyone Else's Expense](http://puu.sh/k0XwW/edaa6e4552.png/) Disrespects after killing

[5. Build Relationships](http://puu.sh/k0ZTv/43e907802d.png/)  Let's find some friends

[6. Show Humility in Victory, and Grace in Defeat](http://puu.sh/k0ZXM/124b3fd98b.png/)  "easy"

[7. Be Resolute, not Indignant](http://puu.sh/k101D/b8122c85f4.png/)  Tilts, cryers, etc

[8. Leave No Newbie Behind!](http://puu.sh/k105F/9a4bc48429.png/)  Teemo with tiamat? Show him is better hurricanee

[9. Lead by Example](http://puu.sh/k108B/5a021ff536.png/)  Use Captain Boots and BoC

![1. Support Your Team](http://puu.sh/k0X9E/8be1353630.png/)
![2. Drive Constructive Feedback](http://puu.sh/k0XmP/033b01d7db.png/)
![3. Facilitate Civil Discussion](http://puu.sh/k0XsU/8730beadf9.png/)
![4. Enjoy Yourself, but not at Anyone Else's Expense](http://puu.sh/k0XwW/edaa6e4552.png/) 
![5. Build Relationships](http://puu.sh/k0ZTv/43e907802d.png/)
![6. Show Humility in Victory, and Grace in Defeat](http://puu.sh/k0ZXM/124b3fd98b.png/)
![7. Be Resolute, not Indignant](http://puu.sh/k101D/b8122c85f4.png/)
![8. Leave No Newbie Behind!](http://puu.sh/k105F/9a4bc48429.png/)
![9. Lead by Example](http://puu.sh/k108B/5a021ff536.png/)

## So, remember! Stay positive, remain calm, and keep to the code!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
